BUILD_SHARED_LIBS:BOOL=ON
BUILD_TESTING:BOOL=OFF

LIBXML2_LIBRARY:FILEPATH=C:/A_VisIt/ForRegression/visit-deps/windowsbuild/MSVC2017/vtk/8.1.0/lib/vtklibxml2-8.1.lib

XDMF_BUILD_EXAMPLES:BOOL=OFF
XDMF_BUILD_MPI:BOOL=OFF
XDMF_BUILD_UTILS:BOOL=OFF
XDMF_BUILD_VTK:BOOL=OFF
XDMF_SYSTEM_HDF5:BOOL=ON
XDMF_SYSTEM_HDF5_IS_PARALLEL:BOOL=OFF
XDMF_SYSTEM_LIBXML2:BOOL=ON
XDMF_SYSTEM_ZLIB:BOOL=ON
